name: Car Dungeon
description:
CAR DUNGEON has gameplay similar to Super Cars, Super Meat Boy, and Radiant Silver Gun. It's a top-down driving game. The car never stops moving and you have to get safely to the end of the level without crashing. I imagine it as a game that you would play on an arcade cabinet with a joystick, Ms. Pac-Man style. The gameplay is very simple. The trailer is pretty explanatory.

All of the games music is done by DST - Deceased Superior Technician. He is a spectacular musician, I strongly recommend checking out his works.

http://www.nosoapradio.us/

I will update the version and file as I update the game.
